CSL ARCH Module » C66x » Interrupt

This file contains the API prototypes for configuring INTC for DSP. More...

#include <stdint.h>

Functions

void Intc_Init (void)
 This API is used to initialize the interrupt controller. This API shall be called before using the interrupt controller. More...

void Intc_SystemEnable (uint16_t intrNum)
 This API enables the system interrupt in INTC. However, for the interrupt generation, make sure that the interrupt is enabled at the peripheral level also. More...
 
void Intc_SystemDisable (uint16_t intrNum)
 This API disables the system interrupt in INTC. More...
 
void Intc_IntEnable (uint32_t status)
 Restore the processor IER status if status is not equal to 0. else enables all the bits in IER. This does not affect the set of interrupts enabled/disabled in the INTC. More...
 
uint32_t Intc_IntDisable (void)
 Read and save the status and Disables the bits in IER . Prevents the processor to respond to interrupts. More...
